original_text: He is afraid and confused. Trouble is ready to attack him, like a king with his army. He is afraid and confused.
korean_text: 환난과 역경이 그를 두렵게 하며 싸움을 준비한 왕처럼 그를 쳐서 이기리라

sentences.original_text: Trouble is ready to attack him,
sentences.korean_translation: 재앙이 그를 공격할 준비를 하고 있으며,

sentences.original_text: like a king with his army.
